title: scissor lift
body:
move <param>

Try moving the lift in the given direction (it will move a set amount, defined by the manufacturer settings). <param> can be one of the following:

u - up
d - down
f - forwards
b - backwards

If the lift detects an obstacle in its projected path, or it has reached its limit in that direction, the command will be ignored.

title: laser tripwires
body:
enable

Turn on the tripwires.

disable

Turn off the tripwires.

title: sentry turret
body:
set <param>

Try changing the settings of the turret. <param> can be one of the following:

on - turn on
off - turn off

NOTE: turning off a turret puts it in stand-by mode, it will be turned on automatically if alert messages are received (e.g. a laser tripwire was obstructed by an unauthorized individual).
